arm_group.description: Catheter insertion using the ViaValve Safety IV Catheter.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Insyte Autoguard BC [Blood Control] Shielded IV Catheter
arm_group.description: Catheter insertion using the Insyte Autoguard BC Shielded IV Catheter

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this pilot study is to collect the necessary information for determining the
      appropriate sample size of a statistically powered trial comparing the performance of two
      different blood control peripheral intravenous catheters.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  18 years of age or older

          -  Willing and able to independently sign an English Informed Consent

          -  Have adequate veins for placement of IV catheters in both right and left upper
             extremities

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Currently taking anti-coagulation medication

          -  Have a known bloodborne disease or bleeding tendency

          -  Have a known fear or adverse reaction to needles or blood

          -  Women who are pregnant or nursing

intervention.description: Insertion of the peripheral intravenous catheters into both upper extremities of subjects

intervention.arm_group_label: Insyte Autoguard BC [Blood Control] Shielded IV Catheter
intervention.intervention_name: Insyte Autoguard BC [Blood Control] Shielded IV Catheter

facility.name: University of Minnesota Interprofessional Education and Resource Center

clinical_study.official_title: Post-Market Study Comparing the Clinical Performance Two Blood Control Safety Peripheral Intravenous Catheters: A Pilot Study

overall_official.last_name: Lori Schwartz, MBA, MSN, RN, PHN

primary_outcome.description: Primary outcome measure will be a composite of user ratings evaluating clinical performance and acceptability of each device via a 6-point Likert questionnaire.
primary_outcome.time_frame: IV catheters will be inserted, secured to subjects, and then immediately removed.  Data regarding the insertion process will then be immediately collected.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Supportive Care
